review_data.content: In this small restaurant you can find guaranteed the real mexican food. Prices are also ok. We took two fajitas and were 100% satisfied.

review_data.title: Finally good mexican food in switzerland...if only the portions were slightly bigger!
review_data.content: First of all the staff is great, really nice, funny, welcoming and we were happy to be able to get by in spanish and french as our german is limited. Food was delicious. Really homey mexican tacos finally something simple but so delicious instead of...More

review_data.title: Pretty Good Food, Terrific Staff
review_data.content: I thought this place did a decent job making a stab at Mexican considering Switzerland is not exactly a mecca for this type of cuisine. Living in a US town that is nearly 20% Mexican, I have access to some terrific South-of-the-Border fare. Even the...More

review_data.title: Angenehmes lockeres Ambiente
review_data.content: Einige der wenigen Sommerabende in Zürich habe ich angeregt in diesem Lokal verbracht. Wir sassen draussen, von drinnen hörten wir...More

review_data.title: Fresh
review_data.content: Good value and nice laid back atmosphere with real authentic mexican. Especially the Guacamole is made fresh and the way it should be and not with added creme fraiche or similar. Only the portions are tiny. The tacos should be called tiny tacos.

review_data.title: Nice lunch, good sauces
review_data.content: Been reading some very conflicting opinions of this place so came for a late lunch on my own (weird thing to do here but I work locally). I have my doubts about the authenticity (the green salad with a roll that came first must be...More

review_data.title: Alright but some pep is missing
review_data.content: The portions are not overwhelmingly large and the food could use some pep. Apparently, there is a Mexican cook, taking care of matters. I can only imagine, that it is deliberately toned down in order to suit the local palates. The interior is somewhat rustical,...More

review_data.title: Great ceviche
review_data.content: Contrary to the other reviewers, I did find that this place serves authentic mexican food. Especially the ceviche was wonderfull, full of different types of seafood and fresh coriandre. The different types of taco's were good as well. The atmosphere is very laid back and...More

review_data.title: Zum ersten Mal Ceviche/Cebiche gegessen!
review_data.content: Wir haben zu einem feinen Caipirigna eine Portion Guacamole und eine Portion Ceviche bestellt. Beides kam frisch zubereitet auf den...More

review_data.title: friendly staff, nice interior, but not so authentic
review_data.content: We have been to el luchador last week as I read about the place and was excited in hope to find some real authentic Mexican food in Zürich. I have been to Mexico for a longer period and love many of the authentic Mexican dishes,...More

review_data.title: Great food
review_data.content: Compared to the other so called mexican restaurants I have been in Zurich this is by far one of the best ones I have eaten. The menu is quite simple and small plates average between 9 to 10CHF, not bad considering the Tacos al Pastor...More

review_data.title: Friendly, but like many other places not 100% authentic Mexican
review_data.content: Friendly, yet a little oblivious server. If you are looking for a real Michelada, don't order it, you might likely be a little disappointed. Tacos al Pastor are not bad, just keep in mind that you are in Zurich and you will pay like being...More
